attributes.additional_details: We call upon the Government to abolish all forms of testing on animals including for scientific, medical, cosmetic, military and other purposes.  We ask the Government to recognise that such actions against other forms of life are both depraved in a civilised society, do not yield accurate results for human subjects and can be replaced with non-animal forms of testing. We can for legislation to be passed that carried a criminal sentence for the continuing use of testing on animals.
